name: canWalljump
note: Inherent ability

name: canTrickyWalljump
note: Inherent ability

name: canInsaneWalljump
note: Extreme difficulty walljumps, around the level of HiJumpless writg.

name: canCrystalFlash
note: FIXME: Needs ability for reader to count stuff, splitting on colon

name: canDamageBoost
note: Inherent ability

name: canIframeSpikeJump
note: Using i-frames to setup a jump from a spike floor. The i-frames are typically obtained by getting damaged by said spike floor

name: canMachball
note: Alias for canMockball

name: canMockball
note: Alias for canMachball

name: canSuitlessMaridia
note: Navigating Maridia without Gravity. This is not required for simple underwater platforming where missing a jump does not leave the player stuck somewhere, or for falling down a submerged room.

name: canUseFrozenEnemies
note: Can use Ice Beam to freeze enemies to use as platforms to reach higher areas

name: canCrabClimb
note: This is defined as repeatedly freezing a crab to climb up a wall, using no other support. This does not include the simple act of using a frozen crab as a stepping stone, even on a wall or in midair.

name: canBeetomClip
note: Using a frozen Beetom to perform a ceiling clip

name: canWallCrawlerClip
note: Using a frozen wall crawling enemy (such as a Zeela or Geemer) to perform a ceiling clip

name: canSunkenDualWallClimb
note: Using a series of rapid, consecutive wall jumps underwater, on two nearby walls, to climb upwards.

name: canMaridiaTubeClip
note: This means clipping into the Maridia tube from above by unmorphing.

name: canHerdBabyTurtles
note: This maneuver involves manipulating baby turtle movement to group them together in a corner, to clear the rest of the surface to charge a shinespark. Much easier with morph.

name: canTunnelCrawl
note: Moving along a 2-tile-high passage while standing up by repeatedly spin-jumping and then pressing down. Comes with softlock risks without Morph Ball.

name: canCWJ
note: Inherent ability

name: canDamageBoostXRayScopeAccess
note: Inherent ability

name: canBombJumpBreakFree
note: From a submerged platform, setting up a single bomb jump above the water line to propel Samus up and over an obstacle.

note.name: canSporeSpawnSkip
note.note: Super is for a Super Block
